[Oportunidade 1]
Oportunidade: Engenheiro de dados

Sobre a vaga
A Soutag √© uma startup que nasceu em BH, e nossa miss√£o √© levar economia e vantagens para os motoristas profissionais, principalmente nos combust√≠veis. O que nos move √© o impacto financeiro e social que nosso produto leva para as fam√≠lias desses e dessas motoristas de aplicativo, taxistas, caminhoneiros, e demais categorias que ganham a vida dirigindo.

J√° contamos com milhares de usu√°rios na plataforma e dezenas de postos em Minas Gerais, e estamos pr√≥ximos de iniciarmos nossa expans√£o nacional, bem como a opera√ß√£o de uma carteira digital.

Precisamos de pessoas com muita energia e disposi√ß√£o para nos ajudar na constru√ß√£o do neg√≥cio. A vaga √© para um "full-stack", que consiga assumir toda a jornada de dados do neg√≥cio. As principais responsabilidades dessa vaga s√£o:

- Projetar, desenvolver e manter pipelines de dados escal√°veis para processar consultas SQL dos nossos bancos de dados.
- Integrar e gerenciar dados de v√°rias fontes, garantindo alta qualidade e consist√™ncia.
- Desenvolver e automatizar processos ETL
- Criar e manter dashboards e relat√≥rios para visualizar insights de dados e apoiar a tomada de decis√µes.
- Implementar boas pr√°ticas de governan√ßa e seguran√ßa de dados.
- Realizar an√°lises para apoiar as √°reas de neg√≥cios.

Qualifica√ß√µes necess√°rias:
- Experi√™ncia comprovada como Engenheiro de Dados, Analista de Dados ou fun√ß√£o semelhante em ambiente de startup.
- Profici√™ncia em SQL e experi√™ncia com bancos de dados relacionais (ex PostgreSQL).
- Experi√™ncia com ferramentas de integra√ß√£o de dados e ETL.
- Profici√™ncia em ferramentas de visualiza√ß√£o de dados (ex Looker, Power BI, etc).
- Familiaridade com linguagens de script (ex Python) para processamento e an√°lise de dados.
- Compreens√£o de conceitos e boas pr√°ticas de data warehousing.
- Capacidade de trabalhar de forma independente e tomar decis√µes sobre ferramentas, or√ßamento e estrat√©gias.

[Oportunidade 3]
Oportunidade: Sr. Machine Learning Engineer - IBP

Sobre a vaga
Overview

Are you passionate about shaping the future of IBP impacting all business functions at a global scale?

Join our team to support global digital developments for PepsiCo, focusing on high-quality demand forecasts and new product forecasting within the Integrated Business Planning program. As part of an interdisciplinary team, you'll build and deploy statistical/machine learning models, collaborating with process owners, product owners, and business users, ensuring the criticality of your developments is understood. You will also serve as an internal ambassador, providing expertise and stewardship in data and analytics.

Responsibilities

Your day to day with us

Actively contribute to code development in projects and services, leading and coaching ML engineers and data scientists.
Act as a contributor in innovation activities.
Work with data scientists, IBP process leads, and BU subject matter experts to identify data clusters for optimal forecasting performance.
Partner with data scientists on discovery, prototypes, and pilot projects, focusing on experiment tracking and translating business models to ML/statistical models.
Collaborate with IBP market deploy and sustain teams to design, implement, and test pre-processing and post-processing modules for improved demand forecasts.
Work with data engineers to ensure proper data access and preparation for model consumption.
Partner with ML engineers and data scientists on industrialization efforts.
Drive the use of the Platform toolset and demonstrate 'the art of the possible' to the business.
Communicate with business stakeholders during service design, training, and knowledge transfer.
Support large-scale experimentation and build data-driven models.
Research state-of-the-art methodologies and techniques for feature engineering and model data preprocessing.

Qualifications

What you will need to succeed

4+ years working in a team to deliver production level analytic solutions - Fluent in git (version control) and with Docker.
4+ years‚Äô experience in ETL and/or data wrangling techniques - Fluent in SQL syntaxis.
4+ years‚Äô experience in Statistical/ML techniques to solve supervised (regression, classification) and unsupervised problems. 
3+ years‚Äô experience in developing business problem related statistical/ML modeling with industry tools with primary focus on Python or Scala development.
Effective business storytelling and communicating data insights in business consumable format - Fluent in one Visualization tool.
Experience with Agile methodology for team work and analytics ‚Äòproduct‚Äô creation - Fluent in Jira, Confluence.
On-the-job experience with Azure cloud services is essential.

Additional qualifications that will make you stand out for this position

Experiences with Deep Learning are a plus.
experience building solutions in the revenue management or in the supply chain space.

What makes us different? 

Hybrid work model: combination of remote and collaborative office experience to enable innovation 
Entrepreneurial environment in leading international company 
Professional growth possibilities & learning opportunities 
Variety of benefits to support your physical, emotional and financial wellbeing 
Volunteering opportunities to help external communities 
Diverse team with more than 30% of female representation & over 30 nationalities 
Have a stake in D&I strategy and bring your whole self to work 

About PepsiCo

We believe that culture should be at the cornerstone of everything we do at PepsiCo. We are agile, innovative and not afraid of failure. We want our team to come to work every day excited to explore new ways to bring enjoyment, refreshment and fun to the world.

PepsiCo Positive (pep+) is the future of our organization ‚Äì a strategic end-to-end transformation, with sustainability at the center of how we will create growth and value by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people.

So, if you‚Äôre ready to be a part of a playground for those who think big, we‚Äôd love to chat.

*We encourage the diversity of applicants across gender, age, ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, social background, religion or belief and disability 

#Locations: Barcelona, Spain; Vitoria-Gasteiz, Spain
